name: Slovak Telekom, a.s.
goal:
Slovak Telekom has been a leader in technological innovations on the Slovak telecommunication market. The company is the biggest provider of wired broadband internet through optical and metallic networks, also provides digital television, mobile communication and mobile internet access. At Slovak Telekom, corporate responsibility principles are an inherent part of our philosophy, strategy and everyday market operations.
Values include: Customer benefits; Respect and integrity; Reliability.
interests: Borders and Security, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
